column4: can somone help me with a fresh breezy install and an NVidia CK8S? (I'm getting no sound, but it seems installed ok)
pastebin the output from ``amixer''
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org is a Web site. Go to Applications> Accessories> Terminal, type: amixer , and paste all the output onto the Web site. Then give me the url you used.
thankyou, a moment please :)
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/6564
you're using normal speakers directly, correct? No digital receiver?
in that Terminal, type: amixer sset 'IEC958' off
still can't hear anything, let me just double check all the outputs... is there anything else it could be?
then, amixer sset 'External Amplifier' off
still nothing.. and I'm pretty sure all my levels are correct :(
is this a dist-upgrade from Hoary or a fresh Breezy install?
do you have multiple sound cards in the computer?
nope, just this inbuilt nvidia card
are you positive you're using the line-out jack?
(and not, say, Mic)
99% but I will now double check :)
ok, yep 100% sure, tried them all just for the sake of it.. it's 100% the right one
use the speaker-test util
ok, where will I find that?
command line
speaker-test has a man page, too.
yeah was just browsing it :)
sorry to bug you, do you know of anything else I could look into for getting this stupid nvidia onboard sound to work?
